titleStmt.title: Iacobs thankfulnesse to God, for Gods goodnesse to Iacob A meditation on Genesis 32. 10. VVherein by the way also the popish doctrine of mans merite is discussed. By Thomas Gataker, B. of D. and pastor of Rotherhith.
titleStmt.author: Gataker, Thomas, 1574-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Haviland, for Fulke Clifton, and are to be sold at his shop upon new Fish-street Hill,

notesStmt.note: Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A-O⁴ (-O4).
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop upon new Fish-street Hill
